title: Pierre Robiglio
text:
I am a PhD student in Economics at Rome Economics Doctorate (RED), a program jointly run by EIEF, LUISS and Tor Vergata.


My research interests are Labor Economics and Industrial Organizations. My JMP, co-authored with with Edoardo Scalcione, is at the intersection of these two fields; we use administrative data to study the labor implications of a collusive scheme in the Portuguese labor market.


My supervisors are Matteo Paradisi and Emilio Calvano.
